name: FindWords Lite
description:
FindWords (Word Search) is a simple word game, a scheme of letters where the aim is to find all words listed, taken randomly from one of two dictionaries, Italian or English (More than 260,000 English words,more than 108 000 Italians word)

===
New MEGA Level ( Iphone and iPad ) ! Infinite Schemes! 
===

Thanks to a word processing algorithm, the schemes are virtually endless and always different from one another, thanks to the large vocabulary (English and Italian)

---


- Choose the language by simply touching one of two flags.


- Endless Schemes.

*In the LITE version you can play NORMAL level
